alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Norfolk; Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 8:56AM EDT until August 18 at 9:45AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Worcester County in central Massachusetts... Northwestern Norfolk County in eastern Massachusetts... Southeastern Middlesex County in northeastern Massachusetts... * Until 945 AM EDT. * At 855 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hopedale, or near Milford, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newton, Framingham, Waltham, Arlington, Marlborough, Natick, Lexington, Milford, Wellesley, Belmont, Acton, Winchester, Hudson, Westborough, Grafton, Concord, Sudbury, Ashland, Bellingham, and Northbridge. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
